description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the information disclosure vulnerability in Microsoft Message Queuing affected by CVE-2024-20664:

1. Ensure your systems are running supported versions of Windows.
2. Download and install the relevant updates listed below to secure the system:
   - KB5034134: [Download Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034134)
   - KB5034123: [Download Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
   - KB5034122: [Download Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
   - KB5034121: [Download Link](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)
3. Restart your system after installation to apply changes.

**Details**:
- These updates address the identified vulnerability which could allow an attacker to read small portions of heap memory, potentially leading to unauthorized data access. 
- It is important to regularly check for and apply all security updates to maintain system integrity and security.

**Preconditions**:
- Validate that your operating system matches any of the build numbers specified in the updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installations.
